title: recommend me a game that the crappiest of laptops can run
body:
i only run league at 30fps on lowest settings, and even then i get lots of fps spikes in fights.  its that bad of a laptop.  

ive played undertale so you dont need to spam this thread with that k.

edit: i should specify im looking for newer indy type games.  all the old games that are getting mentioned ive played :P
